head.title: Williams and Davenport Advance to Open Final

hedline.hl1: Williams and Davenport Advance to Open Final

abstract.p: Photo of tennis player Venus Williams during her semifinal victory at US Open

block.p: In a rematch of the Wimbledon final in July, Venus Williams and Lindsay Davenport will meet in the United States Open final today.

Williams has not lost since winning Wimbledon, and has won a total of 25 consecutive matches. The third-seeded American rallied past top-ranked Martina Hingis, 6-4, 3-6, 7-5, yesterday in the semifinals.
In a rematch of the Wimbledon final in July, Venus Williams and Lindsay Davenport will meet in the United States Open final today.

Williams has not lost since winning Wimbledon, and has won a total of 25 consecutive matches. The third-seeded American rallied past top-ranked Martina Hingis, 6-4, 3-6, 7-5, yesterday in the semifinals.
Hingis, who lost to Williams's sister Serena in last year's final, served for yesterday's match at 5-4 in the third set, but Williams won the final four games to advance.
Davenport, the 1998 Open champion who was seeded second, had an easier time, defeating unseeded Elena Dementieva, 6-2, 7-6 (5), in the first semifinal of the day. SportsSaturday, Page D1.
